name: SUPER SQUARE (Mihanada)
description:
Language: English, Japanese

----------------

This is a score attack game like flight shooter where the player destroys enemies (red cubes).

Players have the ability to use bombs to destroy all enemies at once, in addition to the ability to release a forward shockwave.

Enemies are destroyed when they collide with another enemy of the same size or larger, an obstacle, or the surface of the water, causing large enemies to split into medium-sized ones, medium-sized ones into small ones, and so on.

The more enemies you destroy at the same time, the bigger score you will get, so try to destroy them simultaneously as much as possible within the time limit!

Tips: 

1. The more your score increases, the faster the enemy behaves.

2. the more your score increases, the faster the enemies move, so a good start is key! Collide with large enemies to break them apart!

3. Enemies basically track the player, so take advantage of this and try to hit obstacles!

4. This move to attract enemies is important in all actions!

5. Our highest score is a little over 1 million points!

Translated with DeepL
